title: Man United Hit Rock Bottom
description:
The FC crew react to the fallout from Manchester United's disastrous 4-0 loss to Brentford. The guys break down where it all went wrong for the Red Devils and question why manager Erik ten Hag chose to publicly blame his players after the match. Plus, Luis Garcia and Steve McManaman join the show to analyze Barcelona's goalless draw to start the season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Manchester United embarrassed at Brentford; Barcelona's revolution gets off to a slow start; Arsenal, Man City cruise to victories
